title: ADVENTURES IN PARADISE-e2 e6 [retrotv]
description:
ADVENTURES IN PARADISE (1959)
Adventures in Paradise featured Gardner McKay as Adam Troy, the captain of a freelance schooner called the Tiki. Troy was a Korean War veteran who found adventure across the South Pacific that ranged from Hong Kong to Pitcairn Island. His original partner was Chinese-American Oliver Lee (Weaver Levy). The show was created and sold to television by James A. Michener.

 2. The Black Pearl  10/12/1959 
A native diver discovers a rare black pearl. The find causes a great deal of excitement among the passengers on Adam&#039;s schooner.
  Guest star: Lon Chaney Jr. (One Arm), Hal Baylor (Thompson), Abraham Sofaer (Tamaui), Anthony Steel (Charles Remley), Kurt Kasznar (Wagner), Patricia Medina (Mme Celeste Soulange) 

 6. Safari at Sea    11/16/1959 
A millionaire and his thrill-hungry wife charter the Tiki for a dangerous underwater expedition.
  Guest star: Anthony Eustrel (Doctor), Genevieve Aumont (Girl), John Ericson (Jeff Hazen), Diana Lynn (Nicole Hazen)
